name: Medicine Dash - Hospital Time Management Game
name_original: Medicine Dash - Hospital Time Management Game
description:
The most promising young doctor in town is you!

Dash through a busy ER in a renowned hospital and be efficient to use all your incredible healing skills to treat every single patient!

Live the dramatic routine of a medical resident who knows a lot about human anatomy and has a sanguine love for curing sickness!

Healthcare has never been so thrilling!

HIGHLIGHTS

🏥DASH to treat and cure every patient in many thrilling time management levels! Go rushing into the heat of a busy hospital ER and experience a medical routine not for the weak-hearted!

🏥WATCH your patients expressions closely like a true doctor should and be ready to treat them pronto!

🏥UPGRADE your medical gear with cutting-edge equipment and practice the art of medicine with fabulous efficiency!

🏥PROVE your medical skills in fun mini-games that will get you right into the heat of a young resident’s day-to-day tasks!

It doesn’t matter if a patient is just sneezing or if their whole body is turning grey: every single one of them deserves your medical attention!

If you really want to have your skills noticed in the best hospital in town, you’ll have to show off your efficiency and skill at every opportunity.

A bright future in medicine awaits. Start your residency now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
